message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this incredible product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to start the negotiation with an offer of $700000. I believe this is a fair starting point, considering the product's value and uniqueness.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $650000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the market value of similar products, but I'm still confident that this product's unique features and benefits warrant a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $675000. I believe this is a more reasonable compromise considering the product's value and my initial offer.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $650000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $670000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and our previous discussions.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I understand that we're close to a deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $680000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $678000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering our previous discussions and the product's value.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I need to stay firm on the price.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make one last concession, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go above $670000. I've reached my limit and I need to make a decision. I'm going to have to pass on this deal and explore other options. I appreciate your time and effort, but I think it's time for me to move on.
